jobDescription: Baidu USA Innovation Center is actively seeking Architects to join our vibrant team. You will have an opportunity to tackle some of technologys greatest challenges while making an impact at scale. You will also have opportunities to travel to Baidu China offices in Beijing and Shanghai. The ideal candidate should have experience with large-scale distributed systems for the parallel processing of massive quantities of data, and have experience with large-scale data storage and data retrieval. The position is full-time and based in our Silicon Valley office in Sunnyvale, CA. We provide competitive compensation and benefits.Requirements:
